title: Ms. Reiko Hitomi, Tokyo
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Special Broadcasting Service, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Aerobic exercises
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Women - Japan
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women - Japan
description: Episode number 1 of Series "A Day in the Life of a Woman". Reiko Hitomi is a thirtyish, divorced, single parent who works as an aerobics instructor in Tokyo. The program looks at her decidedly untraditional life, her hopes and dreams as she prepares for an aerobics examination which will give her the essential qualifications to pursue her goal of running her own gym. Introduced by Franca Arena.
